Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada will make its first appearance at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2024.
The Canadians have been drawn alongside former champions- India and Pakistan- the United States of America, and Ireland in Group A.
Others: The ninth edition of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2024 will take place across the length and breadth of the Caribbean islands and the United States of America between June 02-29.
Each team will play a total of four Group matches in this 20-team event.
The top two from each of the four groups will advance to the Super-8 stage, where eight teams will be split into two groups.
The semi-finals will take place on June 27, followed by the summit clash in Barbados on June 29.
